title: Unraveling the unknown: Adaptive spatial planning to enhance climate resilience for the endangered Swamp Grass-babbler (Laticilla cinerascens) with habitat connectivity and complexity approach
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Imon Abedin, Tanoy Mukherjee, Hye-Eun Kang, Tae-Ho Yoon, Hyun-Woo Kim, Shantanu Kundu
